snippet.title: Ultimate Fort Night Survival Royale Battle
snippet.description:
Download now: https://bit.ly/2GOLCoy

The castle war is begin with full of fictional fight, your secret warriors are ready to fight with the knight guards in the third person shooter Ultimate Fort Night Survival: Royale Battle game. Make sure you are on a secret survival mission and going alone inside the castle to win the freedom from the brutal king. The helicopter will help you to reach towards the fort and you have to jump with the parachute inside the castle. Incredible 3D environment of the castle and fabulous camera angles made this game crazier and addictive.

Ultimate Fort Night Survival: Royale Battle is an action game that contains the castle battle missions for you. The knight fighters are keeping eye on the intruders they will attack on you with arrow spitting, guns fires with swords and with much more attacking skills. Unlike the other fort battles games and fort games here, you can play as a warrior hero and warrior girl. Pick up the modern weaponry on run time defeat your rivals quickly and capture the fort. 

GAMEPLAY:

Get ready to enter in a fort battleground and destroy the enemy’s territory in this spectacular shooting Ultimate Fort Night Survival: Royale Battle game. Play as a secret elite agent girl and boy mess with the knight fort fighters. Being assault commando enter volunteer in the castle by jumping from the helicopter. Defeat the castle soldiers with in time and show your heroic skills in this Ultimate Fort Night Survival: Royale Battle shooting game. Modern weaponry of rival soldiers like, AK 47, MP5, M1911 Pistol Sniper gun and Shoot gun, you can grab it by falling down your rivals. You can also attack on the castle soldiers with your swords, and knife. Do not under estimate your enemy they will attack on you by rapid swords, spitting arrow, and with gunfire. The terrific map will guide you how to find the knight soldiers inside the castle. Collect the packages of lifesaver to improve the health and stamina. The battle against the royal castle will give you the realistic feeling of world wars. Become less bleed in war and show your agent warriors skill in this Ultimate Fort Night Survival: Royale Battle shooter game. Enjoy this 3D shooting survival game that especially designed for the castle games lovers.

Ultimate Fort Night Survival: Royale Battle Features:

• Play as a 3rd person secret agent shooter boy and girl.
• Pick up the weaponry of defeated enemy.
• Use first aid box to improve the health.
• Armory contains AK 47, MP5, Sniper gun, Shoot Gun etc.
• Use knife and swords to fall down the castle soldiers. 
• 3D epic castle environment.
• Show your heroic skill to survive in the battlefield.
• Strange camera angles and cool sounds effects.

Fight for your dignity and freedom of the nation, win the castle with your tactical shooting and survival skills. Choose the sharp secret warrior girl and boy pick up the most advance weaponry by defeating your rivals in Ultimate Fort Night Survival: Royale Battle shooting game. Enjoy this castle shooting game and show your strategy of capturing the castle.
